com.googlecode.aluminumproject.interceptors
Class WriterReplacer

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.interceptors.WriterReplacer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionInterceptor
public abstract class WriterReplacer
extends Object
implements ActionInterceptor

An action interceptor that will replace the writer that will be used by the action.

createWriter

protected abstract Writer createWriter(ActionContext actionContext)
Creates the writer that will be used by the action. The original writer can be obtained by asking the supplied action context for it.

Parameters:
actionContext - the current action context
Returns:
the writer to use
